tool.name: SAGA.shapes_polygons.10
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOLYGONS False output_data_PARTS $output_data_PARTS name SAGA.shapes_polygons.10 POLYGONS $POLYGONS LAKES $LAKES prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PARTS $OutputSection_PARTS.outputType_PARTS transmissionMode_PARTS $OutputSection_PARTS.transmissionMode_PARTS

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PARTS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PARTS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Splits parts of multipart polygons into separate polygons. This can be done only for islands (outer rings) or for all parts (inner and outer rings) by checking the 'lakes' option.
